channel.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
channel.description:
[quote="RSVault"]You do realize that RS2006 has 60,000+ members? You do realize it's the biggest RSPS in ages to ever hit RSPS? You do realize that my server has brought tons of attention to MoparScape? You do realize that my server has increased revenue from ads from MoparScape? You do realize that your decision was completely ignorant?
I had asked for my website to be approved multiple times in the past and none of you moderators decided to care. That's called ignorance right there. Riddle me this. How can a website with 60,000+ members [b]NOT [/b]be approved? You must've been on drugs when you locked that thread.
I demand it to be approved and re-opened.
Vault.[/quote]
I demand you refund all the people you force to donate to play your shitty server. once you show me the paypal logs I will consider allowing your site to be approved.
[quote="RSVault"]Honestly, I'm not forcing anyone to pay for pre-alpha you dumb shit. Read about my server before you say ignorant crap like that. NO ONE has ever had a remake that's become this big, and therefor little minds like you don't know how to handle things like this, you dumb shit. For the stability test we let everyone on, I'm guessing you didn't know about that either because your an ignorant bitch, right? Exactly. Don't say shit without knowing what you're talking about. It seems like you're just after the money made from RS2006, which by the way, all of it goes towards the server. I requested my website to approved several times before, but you half-brained, ignorant moderators don't give a single shit, so don't go around spreading crap and locking the best project to ever hit moparscape or RSPS.
Dumb shit.[/quote]
This makes you look really good :)

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

donate money to a server they cannot freely play.[/quote]rep++[quote=“Davidi2, post:885, topic:391852”]Specifically, asking for donations for a game nobody can even play yet. And then forcing them to pay in order to play prebetaomegaalpha or whatever, I don’t see how that’s different than having to buy membership.

[quote=“RSVault”]You do realize that RS2006 has 60,000+ members? You do realize it’s the biggest RSPS in ages to ever hit RSPS? You do realize that my server has brought tons of attention to MoparScape? You do realize that my server has increased revenue from ads from MoparScape? You do realize that your decision was completely ignorant?

I had asked for my website to be approved multiple times in the past and none of you moderators decided to care. That’s called ignorance right there. Riddle me this. How can a website with 60,000+ members NOT be approved? You must’ve been on drugs when you locked that thread.

I demand it to be approved and re-opened.

Vault.[/quote]lol’d

Nowhere on any of your sites do you support MoparScape, and I just took a look around your site, and you ended up making your own RSPS community?
http://www.yourgaywebsite.net/services/news/newsitem.ws?id=29

Over the past week I've been working on creating a RuneScape private server community where you can discuss, download, share tutorials, ask for help, and learn how to create your very own RuneScape private server!

If you’ve ever been interested in programming (or coding as some of you call it), or you already program, this is definitely a great place to learn and extend your knowledge of several programming languages, the big one being Java.

There are a several large communities like this, but not nearly as organized or as professional as RuneBit is, so we’re hoping this will become the most well known place to discuss and learn how to program RuneScape private servers.

Click the following link to go to the RuneBit home page, and make sure to sign up on the forums to start making your very own RuneScape private server:

http://www.yourgayrspscommunity.com/forum.php

Mod Vault
Head of RS2006

Yea… my vote would be we just censor your sites completely for using MoparScape as free advertising. I’ll ask Silab what she think.s I also reported your youtube channel to copyright@jagex.com for giggles, I have no clue if they actually look at that stuff though.

Read full topic
item.source: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I’ve had enough of this thread, the site is not approved. it seems you are luring those from your twitter page to donate money to a server they cannot freely play.

Read full topic
item.source: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“RSVault, post:1137, topic:391852”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=489018.msg3908067#msg3908067 date=1328415418]

Stability Test = Over

We clearly see what happen. Did anyone ever get online?
[/quote]

We had 500 at one point.[/quote]
500 people were on spread out over the entire world. When people did ::home, nobody could stay logged in for more than a minute. Seems to me that if you did anything at all you would freeze up and crash. Pre-Alpha is going to be a huge let-down and a lot of “donators” are going to be very disappointed. I am not surprised Vault.

Website still needs work…

Read full topic

item.source: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @RedDeadDorito RedDeadDorito
item.description:
@RedDeadDorito wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:1124, topic:391852”][quote author=RedDeadDorito link=topic=489018.msg3907952#msg3907952 date=1328409243]

Lol 200 players log in and it crashes

Look at one noob posted on Scu11’s home page

“Seriously bro. You have nothing better to do than hate on vault because his project is far superior to any project you have ever done.”

Fucking ignorant community.

You are the epitome of a hater. Why so much hate? You mad because he’s created what you can’t? (Even if he is using money for his own benefit, you mad that you couldn’t come up with it?). Have a seat, Mr. Angry.

He never came up with it you jackass, the first rs remake was OS Remake and the one after that was RS-Reborn. He hasn’t “come up” with anything. Do you know rs2007? It failed miserably. You might say, “Oh there were a lot of people logging in on one place,” That’s bullshit. He leeched PJA and then offered to pay somebody with money that he received from donators, but when that person rejected, Vault had no choice but to host it and hope for the best. Obviously the server couldn’t handle the players and Vault shut down, taking the donator’s money with him.

I don’t think you understand what ignorant means. The ignorant community blindly spammed two R-S mods because Vault said he was banned. They all spammed unban Vault but neither Scu11 nor Santa has the power to unban. Therefore, the community is ignorant, or lacking of knowledge.

That bullshit you read on rs2006 is completely useless

That’s unfortunate if it’s true. Do you have any proof?

For which part? The one where he leeched the source and then tried to pay a programmer? Scully has a pic of Vault attempting to pay for full combat.

I’m sure he’ll need programmers, can’t do it alone. Show the pic anyway. As a matter of fact, show anything you got.
[/quote]

dawn and Scully both have pictures. You can pm one of them if you want, I’m not going to track it down to prove a point, I have better things to do. The entire mopar community knows Vault can’t code himself.[/quote]
So it’s 1 picture of him asking for help? What does that prove other than he needs help???

Read full topic

Obviously the server couldn’t handle the players and Vault shut down, taking the donator’s money with him.

I don’t think you understand what ignorant means. The ignorant community blindly spammed two R-S mods because Vault said he was banned. They all spammed unban Vault but neither Scu11 nor Santa has the power to unban. Therefore, the community is ignorant, or lacking of knowledge.

That bullshit you read on rs2006 is completely useless

That’s unfortunate if it’s true. Do you have any proof?

For which part? The one where he leeched the source and then tried to pay a programmer? Scully has a pic of Vault attempting to pay for full combat.
[/quote]

dawn and Scully both have pictures. You can pm one of them if you want, I’m not going to track it down to prove a point, I have better things to do. The entire mopar community knows Vault can’t code himself.

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

zing?

and I got a joke!

So there is this guy who pays for his content, and this guy who creates his own unique content. Now this guy who recreates a certain time area on a common game is buying his content, and the guy who makes UNIQUE content who writes his own. Who do you think lasts longest? The unique guy! Zing! How is this funny? Cause the truth hurts/is funny

:trollface:

Read full topic
item.source: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days

item.title: RS2006 - Bringing back the good ol' days
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“RSVault, post:1118, topic:391852”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=489018.msg3907804#msg3907804 date=1328402683]

I dun heard you crashed after 200 players. 200 != 2000!

the server started blocking some IPs.

People were getting T2 errors for player updating. And they had more than 255 people in one region and I bet runesource/vault’s source didn’t check for that and make sure it didn’t try updating for 255+ players.

I’ll sell this fix, 500$. Five minute offer only.
[/quote]

Good joke, got any more?[/quote]

Whats the difference between your source and PI?

Nothing.

Zing!

Read full topic
